TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SettingsManageability extends System.Enum

summary.span: Provides values to indicate which services should be made available to application settings.

span.span: Provides values to indicate which services should be made available to application settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O tributo é usado para aplicar as propriedades de configurações de aplicativos individuais e grupos de propriedade para indicar que especial e predefinidos serviços devem ser fornecidas para eles.The ttribute is used to apply individual application settings properties and property groups to indicate that special, predefined services are to be provided for them. O enumeração lista os serviços que estão disponíveis.The enumeration lists the services that are available. A maioria desses serviços será fornecida pelo sistema operacional Windows.Most of these services will be provided by the Windows operating system.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Configuration.SettingsManageability Roaming = int32(0)

summary.span: Enables application settings to be stored in roaming user profiles.

span.span: Enables application settings to be stored in roaming user profiles.

summary.span: For more information about roaming user profiles, see [Isolated Storage and Roaming](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d3cca593-4521-408d-b323-ea398d226de3).

span.span: For more information about roaming user profiles, see [Isolated Storage and Roaming](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d3cca593-4521-408d-b323-ea398d226de3).
